tossup_question: 3) PHYSICS  What force perpendicular to a surface is responsible for keeping objects on the surface?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Friction
X) Normal Force
Y) Gravity
Z) Buoyancy
bonus_question: 3) PHYSICS  A 10 kilogram ball is rolled along a frictionless surface at a constant velocity of 6 meters per second. What is the linear momentum of the ball?
